alert.note: Alert for Bossier; Webster (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 3:26PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Webster and east central Bossier Parishes through 415 PM CDT... At 326 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Dixie Inn, or near Minden, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Minden, Cotton Valley, Dixie Inn, Evergreen, Gilark and Couchwood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
